name: Nesha Hawa
wishText: May Allah always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: On this day, a beautiful princess was born and her name is Nesha Hawa.Fortunately,she fell in love with me and made me the luckiest guy in the whole wide world!
text3: My Love, 518 days of knowing you such a blessing.youre my soul,my sunshine and my everything.On this special day, I vow to cherish you, to adore you, and to love you more fiercely than ever before. I promise to stand by your side through every triumph and every trial, to support you, to encourage you, and to lift you up whenever you need it.
text4: i am the luckiest man alive to have you in my life.Sayang you've been nothing but kind to me, the
text4Adjective: special one for me and the only one for me
text5Entry: Through everything, I’ll love you for as long as you need me to. Even if we’re seperated by the seven seas and skies, if we’re meant to be, it will be, and not a day goes by where I don’t pray for you to be my happily ever after. To me, with you, and for you.,
text5Content: I Love You So Much Cinta Hati
outroText: I pray for all the greatest things in life to be brought to you, all your hardships to be settled with ease and all your pain and loneliness be taken away, and I pray that I can always stand beside you, watching over you and see how our journey goes. Keep being yourself, and I’ll keep trying to make you happy, until the end of my time. I’ll always be here and yours, for as long as you want me to.
replayText: Have a blast one sayang. I love you so much and Happy 22nd Birthday baby manja <3.
